trans-unit.source: Provides specifications for protocols and data formats for the messages used in the action supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia specyfikacje protokołów i formatów danych dla wiadomości używany w Akcja obsługiwane przez usługi XML sieci Web.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ta nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: The `OperationBinding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<operation>` element enclosed by the `<binding>` element, which in turn corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: `OperationBinding` Klasa odnosi się do usługi sieci Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<operation>` wewnątrz elementu `<binding>` element, który z kolei odpowiada <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> klasy.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat języka WSDL, zobacz specyfikację na http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `OperationBinding` class.
trans-unit.target: W poniższym przykładzie pokazano użycie właściwości i metody ujawnione przez `OperationBinding` klasy.

trans-unit.source: It takes an existing <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and adds support for the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: Trwa istniejące <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> i dodaje obsługę protokołu SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> którego bieżący <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> jest elementem członkowskim.

trans-unit.source: A binding of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> is a member.
The current <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> is a member of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Operations%2A> collection.
Gets the collection of extensibility elements specific to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję elementów rozszerzalności specyficzne dla bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of extensibility elements.
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji o sieci Web Services Description Language (WSDL), zobacz specyfikację na http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBindingCollection" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> instance.
A fault binding collection.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
An `OperationBinding` will be associated with exactly one `InputBinding`.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
An `OperationBinding` will be associated with exactly one `OutputBinding`.
OperationBinding_OperationBinding#5
